snippet: Dr. John C. Reed, the chief executive of the Sanford-Burnham Medical Research Institute, will become head of Roche’s pharmaceutical research and early development group in April.
abstract: Dr John C Reed, chief executive of the Sanford-Burnham Medical Research Institute, will become head of Swiss drugmaker Roche’s pharmaceutical research and early development group in April 2013.
